problem.title: The Largest Problem No One Talks About
problem.subtitle: Every Batch Carries Hidden Risk
problem.description: Advanced therapy manufacturing faces a critical blind spot:

problems.title: Batch failures are costly
problems.description: lost materials, facility time, and delays

problems.title: Raw materials are the silent failure vector
problems.description: subtle variations cascade into major deviations

problems.title: Manufacturing teams are constantly firefighting
problems.description: We are providing another tool to help your teams out

problems.title: Critical data lives in silos
problems.description: CoAs, LIMS, MES systems never talk to each other

platform.title: Product Overview: AI-Powered Risk Intelligence
platform.subtitle: Predictive Models That Understand Bioprocessing
platform.description: RawMaterialPredictive transforms raw material data into actionable risk intelligence:

coreCapabilities.title: AI-powered risk scoring
coreCapabilities.description: for incoming raw material lots before batch start

coreCapabilities.title: Robust ML models
coreCapabilities.description: trained on 100+ digitized CoAs and process outcomes

coreCapabilities.title: Cascading risk modeling
coreCapabilities.description: we predict how today's material choices affect downstream quality

coreCapabilities.title: Embedding-based similarity detection
coreCapabilities.description: with envelope-based scoring for outlier identification

differentiators.title: Process-aware models
differentiators.description: that understand ADC conjugation, CGT transduction, and mAb production

differentiators.title: Real-time prediction
differentiators.description: flag high-risk lots before they enter your expensive processes

differentiators.title: Integration flexibility
differentiators.description: works with your existing MES/LIMS or simple CSV uploads

technicalEdge.title: 80% recall on 100-row datasets
technicalEdge.description: proven performance even with limited historical data

technicalEdge.title: Continuous improvement
technicalEdge.description: Your model improves exponentially with every batch you go through

technicalEdge.title: Robust architecture
technicalEdge.description: handles the messy, non-standard reality of biotech data

technicalEdge.title: Fine-tuning superiority
technicalEdge.description: customer-specific models achieve higher accuracy without data sharing
